title: A funeral elegie, upon the death of George Sonds, Esq; &c. Who was killed by his brother, Mr. Freeman Sonds, August the 7th. anno Dom. 1655. By William Annand Junior, of Throwligh. Whereunto is annexed a prayer, compiled by his sorrowfull father Sir George Sonds, and used in his family during the life of the said Freeman.
author: Annand, William, 1633-1689.
notes: Mostly in verse - "Reach me a handcerchiff; another yet,".
Included at end: "A prayer made by Sir George Sonds".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
